Trigger.name: Just influenced - gag it
Trigger.script:
mm.deleteAllP()
if mmi.influence_gag then return end
mmi.influence_gag = (tempExactMatchTrigger or tempTrigger)("You have recovered equilibrium.", [[ mm.deleteLineP() killTrigger(mmi.influence_gag) mmi.influence_gag = nil ]])

You confide
You compliment
You
With a wink and a nudge,
Ooohing and ahhhing
Sniggering cruelly,
Showing no mercy,
Smoothing back your hair
You pull
Smiling encouragingly
Explaining
Keeping up
Explaining your abject poverty
Keeping up a non-stop patter, you
With great sincerity, you whisper

Trigger.name: completed
Trigger.script:
mmi.doneinfluencing()
selectString(line, 1) setFgColor(85, 0, 0) setBgColor(85, 170, 255) resetFormat()
tempTimer(0, function () mm.echof("Done influencing this denizen.") end)
if mm.conf.figurine ~= 0 and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.esteem) > 0 then send("imbue "..mm.conf.figurine.." with " ..gmcp.Char.Vitals.esteem.. " esteem", false) end

Trigger.name: mmi Something
Trigger.script: enableTrigger("Capture something") enableTrigger("Empty influence") disableTrigger("mmi Something")

Trigger.name: End
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("Capture something") disableTrigger("Empty influence") local debug = require"debug" local s,m = xpcall(mmi.finishedcapture, debug.traceback) if not s then display(m) end

return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: Influenced
Trigger.script: -- Ordering of this trigger matters! mmi.analysis_says_influenced()

Alias.name: Manually influence a denizen with type
Alias.script:
if matches[2] == "seduce" then matches[2] = "seduction" end
mmi.influence(matches[3], matches[2])

Alias.name: Influence all
Alias.script:
local o = matches[2]
if o == "all" then mmi.startinfluenceroom()
elseif o == "clear" and matches[3] == "uninfluencable" then local r = db:delete(mmi.db.uninfluencable, true) if not r then mm.echof("Cleared uninfluencable db okay.") else mm.echof("Couldn't clear uninfluencable db - %s", tostring(r)) end
elseif o and matches[3] then mmi.influence(o, matches[3])
end

ScriptGroup.name: m&m Influencing Addon
ScriptGroup.script:
mmi = mmi or {}
mmi.conf = mmi.conf or {} mmi.conf.influenceundead = false
-- current target to be analyzed by ID mmi.analyzetarget = false
mmi.roomnpcs = {} -- a list of key'd tables; each table inside it is an npc that contains -- shortname, id, disposition, whenever it should be influenced and whenever it has been influenced
mmi.target, mmi.influencing, mmi.attacktype = nil, nil, nil mmi.influenceroom = nil
mmi.disps = { friendly = "charity", greedy = "weaken", brave = "empower", sensuous = "seduction", intimidating = "paranoia", }
mmi.guards = { -- Mag "an Ur'Guard Grand Marshal",
-- Glom "an illithoid scourge", "a dark nighthag", "a shadowlord widowrider", "a Daughter of Darkness", "a Daughter of Night",
-- Serenwilde "a moon maiden", "a frost hag", "a centaur hunter", "a kephera warder",
-- Hallifax "a Sentinel Deputy Commissar", "a Guardian of the Dodecahedron",
-- New Celest "an archon of Eternal Light", "a cavalier of the Light", "a Kusala of the Tahtetso", "a Zetetic of the Tahtetso", }

Script.name: db
Script.script:
db:create("mmInfluenceDB", { mobs = { name = "", id = "", longname = "", areaname = "", disposition = "", roomid = 0, undead = 0, guard = 0,
_unique = {"id"}, _violations = "REPLACE" }, uninfluencable = { name = "", _unique = {"name"}, _violations = "IGNORE" } })
mmi.db = db:get_database("mmInfluenceDB")
function mmi.updatenpc(data) assert(type(data) == 'table') db:merge_unique(mmi.db.mobs, data) end
function mmi.updatenonnpc(data) assert(type(data) == 'table') db:merge_unique(mmi.db.uninfluencable, data) end

Script.name: room tracking
Script.script:
function mmi.currentarea() if atcp.RoomArea then return atcp.RoomArea elseif gmcp and gmcp.Room and gmcp.Room.Info and gmcp.Room.Info.area then return gmcp.Room.Info.area else return "" end end
function mmi.analyze(what) -- don't do anything if we've already analyzing if mmi.analyzetarget then return end
mmi.analyzetarget = what mm.doadd("analyze "..mmi.analyzetarget)
enableTrigger("mmi Analysis") mmi.analysistimer = tempTimer(5, function() disableTrigger("mmi Analysis"); mmi.analyzetarget = nil end) end
function mmi.analysis_says_influenced() if not mmi.analyzetarget then return end
if mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.analyzetarget] then mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.analyzetarget].influenced = true end end
function mmi.analysisresult(disposition) if not mmi.analyzetarget then return end
-- update our in-room table if mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.analyzetarget] then if disposition == "not influencable" then mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.analyzetarget].influencable = false elseif disposition == "nothere" then mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.analyzetarget].ishere = "unknown" else mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.analyzetarget].disposition = disposition end end
mmi.analyzetarget = nil killTimer(mmi.analysistimer) disableTrigger("mmi Analysis")
raiseEvent("mmi analyzed target") end
local capturing function mmi.whoishere() if capturing then return end mmi.roomnpcs = {}
sendAll("config pagelength 250", "ih", "config pagelength 40")
enableTrigger("mmi Something") if capturing then killTimer(capturing) end capturing = tempTimer(5+getNetworkLatency(), function() disableTrigger("mmi Something") capturing = false end) end
function mmi.addnpc() local name,id,longname = matches[2], matches[3], matches[4]
mmi.roomnpcs[tostring(matches[3])] = { shortname = matches[2], disposition = false, influencable = true, influenced = false, undead = false, longname = matches[4] } end
function mmi.finishedcapture() killTimer(capturing) capturing = false
local mobids = {}; for id, _ in pairs(mmi.roomnpcs) do mobids[#mobids+1] = id end
-- fill in what we know from influencable db local r = db:fetch(mmi.db.mobs, db:in_(mmi.db.mobs.id, mobids)) for _, t in ipairs(r) do mmi.roomnpcs[t.id].disposition = (t.disposition ~= "" and t.disposition or false) mmi.roomnpcs[t.id].undead = (t.undead == 1 and true or false) mmi.roomnpcs[t.id].guard = (t.guard == 1 and true or false) end
-- fill in what we know from uninfluencable db local mobnames = {}; for _, t in pairs(mmi.roomnpcs) do mobnames[#mobnames+1] = t.longname end r = db:fetch(mmi.db.uninfluencable, db:in_(mmi.db.uninfluencable.name, mobnames)) for _,t in ipairs(r) do for _, npc in pairs(mmi.roomnpcs) do if npc.longname == t.name then npc.influencable = false end end end
-- guards are empower only, so set them all to brave for id, t in pairs(mmi.roomnpcs) do if table.contains(mmi.guards, t.longname) then t.disposition = "brave"; t.guard = true end end
-- delete groups, uninfluencable and just litters db local delete = {} for id, t in pairs(mmi.roomnpcs) do if string.find(t.longname, "^a group of") then delete[#delete+1] = id end end
for _, id in ipairs(delete) do mmi.roomnpcs[id] = nil end
raiseEvent("mmi finished capture") end

Script.name: main
Script.script:
local attacks, types = { begging = "charity", rumours = "paranoia", teasing = "weaken", compliments = "empower", flattery = "seduction", supplication = "charity", distrust = "paranoia", mockery = "weaken", admiration = "empower", charm = "seduction", wheedling = "charity", conspiracies = "paranoia", derision = "weaken", praise = "empower", beguiling = "seduction", amnesty = "amnesty" }, {}
-- auto-setup org-specific attacks as well if mm and mm.conf and mm.conf.org then if mm.conf.org == "Glomdoring" then attacks.manipulation = "village" attacks.trickery = "village" attacks.intrigue = "village" elseif mm.conf.org == "Magnagora" then attacks.shock, attacks.awe, attacks.brainwash = "village", "village", "village" elseif mm.conf.org == "Serenwilde" then attacks.lectures, attacks.recitation, attacks.oration = "village", "village", "village" elseif mm.conf.org == "Celest" then attacks.proselytizing, attacks.preaching, attacks.evangelizing = "village", "village", "village" elseif mm.conf.org == "Hallifax" then attacks.accordance, attacks.collaboration, attacks.assimilation = "village", "village", "village" elseif mm.conf.org == "Gaudiguch" then attacks.liberty, attacks.freedom, attacks.revolution = "village", "village", "village" end end
for attack, type in pairs(attacks) do if types[type] then types[type][#types[type]+1] = attack else types[type] = {attack} end end
-- start the influencing process on a denizen w/ given type. -- this function will automatically use the attacks possible function mmi.influence(target, type) if not target then mm.echof("Whom do you wish to influence?"); return; end if not type then mm.echof("What type of attack should we use on the %s?", target); return; end if not types[type] then mm.echof("We don't know any %s attacks :(", type); return; end
mmi.target = target mmi.influencing = true mmi.attacktype = type
raiseEvent("mmi started influencing", target, type) end
function mmi.doneinfluencing(arg) if not mmi.influencing then return end
if arg == "undead" then -- nope, can't influence - undead if mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.target] then mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.target].undead = true end mmi.conf.influenceundead = false elseif arg == "uninfluencable" then if mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.target] then mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.target].influencable = false end elseif arg == "not here" then if mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.target] then mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.target] = nil end elseif mmi.target and mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.target] then -- influenced in room if mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.target] then mmi.roomnpcs[mmi.target].influenced = true end end
mmi.target, mmi.influencing, mmi.attacktype = nil, nil, nil tempLineTrigger(1,1, 'raiseEvent("mmi done influencing", arg)') end
function mmi.stopinfluencing() mm.echof("Stopped influencing %s.", (mmi.target and mmi.target or "nothing")) mmi.target, mmi.influencing, mmi.attacktype = nil, nil, nil raiseEvent("mmi stopped influencing") end
function mmi.doinfluencing() if not mmi.influencing or not mm.bals.balance or not mm.bals.equilibrium then return end
send(string.format("influence %s with %s", mmi.target, types[mmi.attacktype][math.random(1, #types[mmi.attacktype])]), false)
return true end
mm.addbalanceful("mmi.doinfluencing", mmi.doinfluencing)

Script.name: mmi_think
Script.script:
-- main func that decides what should be influenced or analyzed function mmi_think() if not mmi.influenceroom then return end
for id, t in pairs(mmi.roomnpcs) do if t.influencable and not t.influenced and not t.ishere == "unknown" and not t.disposition then mmi.analyze(id) return elseif t.influencable and not t.influenced and not (t.undead and not mmi.conf.influenceundead) then -- we may also influence to check if the thing is present in the room -- convert disposition to attack type & send it away to be influenced mmi.influence(id, (mmi.disps[t.disposition] or "empower")) return end end
mmi.influenceroom = false tempTimer(0, function () mm.echof("Done influencing the whole room.") end) if say then say("Finished influencing at "..gmcp.Room.Info.name) end raiseEvent("mmi finished influencing room") end
function mmi.startinfluenceroom() mmi.influenceroom = true mmi.whoishere() end
function mmi.stopinfluenceroom() mmi.stopinfluencing() mmi.influenceroom = false
mm.echof("Stopped influencing everything in the room.") raiseEvent("mmi stopped influencing room") end

Script.name: mmi_updatedb
Script.script:
function mmi_updatedb() local r = {}
for id, t in pairs(mmi.roomnpcs) do if t.influencable then r[#r+1] = {id = id, name = t.shortname, areaname = mmi.currentarea(), undead = (t.undead and 1 or 0), guard = (t.guard and 1 or 0), disposition = (t.disposition and t.disposition or ""), longname = t.longname, roomid = mmp.currentroom } end end
mmi.updatenpc(r)
r = {} for id, t in pairs(mmi.roomnpcs) do if not t.influencable then r[#r+1] = {name = t.longname} end end
mmi.updatenonnpc(r) end

Script.name: mmi_add_config
Script.script: function mmi_add_config() mm.config.setoption("figurine", { type = "number", onset = function () if mm.conf.figurine == 0 then mm.echof("Won't auto-imbue figurines after influencing.") else mm.echof("Set the figurine # to "..mm.conf.figurine.." - will be imbuing essence into it. To stop imbuying, set it to 0.") end end }) end
